Name: Passport to Pigmote Isle
Description: A young rat sits at a small desk. "Passport!" it demands. "Or a bit of paper, if that's easier. Chief just says I got to stamp something. That way your visit's proper official."

DefaultEvent.Name: The Return to Pigmote Isle
DefaultEvent.Description: The rat proudly marks your paper with a stamp carved from a mushroom. "Welcome to Murinia," it declares, saluting. "Enjoy your stay."

ChildBranches.Name: Find something for it to stamp

DefaultEvent.Name: The Return to Pigmote Isle
DefaultEvent.Description: The rat proudly marks your paper with a stamp carved from a mushroom. "Welcome to Murinia," it declares, saluting. "Enjoy your stay."

ChildBranches.Name: Find something for it to stamp
ChildBranches.Description: A piece of paper should do.

DefaultEvent.Name: Persona non grata
DefaultEvent.Description:
The rat reaches down to stamp your paper. It looks up. Its whiskers quiver as it looks properly at your face. It screams and it screams and it screams.

That'll be a 'no', then...

ChildBranches.Name: A quiet return
ChildBranches.Description: Hopefully they have forgotten what happened last time.
